attributes.action: leave the EU now so as we do not have to have road charges
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The only reason Blair will egnore the last petition on road charges is because it has been brought in by the EU which he signed up for some time ago, it didnt matter even if it got 5 million sign, he still could not drop it, so lets vote to get out of the EU NOW..!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
